import React, { Component } from 'react'; import SearchTask from './SearchTask'; class Controller extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { sort : { by : 'name', value : 1 } } } onClick = (sortBy,sortValue) => { this.setState ({ sort : { by : sortBy, value : sortValue } }); } render() { var {sort} = this.state; return (
  • this.onClick('name',1) }> Sort by A-Z
  • this.onClick('name',-1)}> Sort by Z-A
  • this.onClick('status',1)}> Activate
  • this.onClick('status',-1)}> Deactivate
); } } export default Controller;
